description:
The media controls the perception of millions of people. 90% of mainstream media is controlled by just 6 corporations. If you trace back further, you'll realize they all work for the same people. Through fear based propoganda, mainstream media has been the driving factor for the mass manipulation of society. People who watch the mainstream media view their words as if it were the words of God. In my story today I talked about the difference between Repeaters and Critical Thinkers. Don't be a Repeater.  Be a Critical Thinker. Dive deep into research whenever confronted with new information and make a decision for yourself. Don't just believe whatever you are told. Especially from governments and mainstream media. Let's just say they've had quite the track record when it comes to spreading false information in order to pursue the agenda of the people they work for... #freedomfighters #mediadeception #freedomkeepersÂ #endthelockdown
#martiallawÂ  #agenda21 #4biddenknowledge #believemothers  #saveourstate #parentalrights #propoganda #robertkennedyjr #chemtrails #totalcontrol #mediapropaganda #mainstreammedia #medialies #event201 #perceptionisreality
